text: To examine possible transmission of Bartonella through biting , grooming , blood sharing , or fecal - oral exposure , we used metagenomic data from a parallel study to screen vampire bat saliva and fecal samples for Bartonella DNA . Three saliva and three fecal pools were shotgun sequenced , each containing nucleic acid extractions from swabs collected from ten vampire bats from one to two colonies . Pooled samples contained individuals from the same colonies of bats tested for Bartonella in blood through PCR , though not necessarily the same individuals .
